text: Bagre Dam is a multipurpose dam on the White Volta located near Bagré Village in Burkina Faso. ==History== The Dam constructed in 1992 at a cost of 67 million CFA from the World Bank. ==References== Category:Embankment dams Category:Dams in Burkina Faso Category:Hydroelectric power stations in Burkina Faso Category:Ramsar sites in Burkina Faso Category:Dams completed in 1992 Category:Energy infrastructure completed in 1992
title: Bagre Dam
